idea:
Suta, is a fresh design house that centers on creating a range of attire with a blend of tradition and contemporaneity. Sutaâ€™s crafted inspirations pay attention to details and the designs add elegance, boldness and grace. SUTA or thread, the basis of the brand's inspiration is a reminder of the craft traditions of India. Like a pure creation that begins with a needle and thread, SUTA offers novelty each time it is experienced.

The products of Suta are created in various villages in India. At present we work with 120 weavers and we plan to have many more of them. Sujata Biswas and Taniya Biswas, the Co-founders quit their corporate jobs and started Suta on 1st April 2016
name: Suta
